mapper.sql: ORDERDID, ORDERDORDERM, ORDERDCODE, ORDERDTYPE, ORDERDNAME, ORDERDDETAIL, ORDERDUNITS, ORDERDPRICE, ORDERDUNIT, ORDERDCLASS, ORDERDNUM, ORDERDMONEY, ORDERDRIGHTMONEY
mapper.select: select d.* from orderd d left join orderm m on m.ordermid = d.orderdorderm where d.orderdtype = #{orderdtype} and m.ordermcustomer = #{orderm.ordermcustomer}
mapper.insert:
insert into ORDERD
ORDERDID,
ORDERDORDERM,
ORDERDCODE,
ORDERDTYPE,
ORDERDNAME,
ORDERDDETAIL,
ORDERDUNITS,
ORDERDPRICE,
ORDERDUNIT,
ORDERDCLASS,
ORDERDNUM,
ORDERDMONEY,
ORDERDRIGHTMONEY,

mapper.update:
update ORDERD
ORDERDORDERM = #{orderdorderm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDCODE = #{orderdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDTYPE = #{orderdtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDNAME = #{orderdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDDETAIL = #{orderddetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDUNITS = #{orderdunits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDPRICE = #{orderdprice,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ORDERDUNIT = #{orderdunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDCLASS = #{orderdclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERDNUM = #{orderdnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDERDMONEY = #{orderdmoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ORDERDRIGHTMONEY = #{orderdrightmoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
where ORDERDID = #{orderdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
